author: Jordi Boggiano
title: benjaminhaeberli/php-skeleton
text: ‚ú® A modern PHP skeleton that includes CI/CD, PHPStan, Pest & more. Maintainers Details github.com/benjaminhaeberli/php-skeleton Fund package maintenance! benjaminhaeberli [Installs](/packages/benjaminhaeberli/php-skeleton/stats): 4 [Dependents](/packages/benjaminhaeberli/php-skeleton/dependents?order_by=downloads): 0 [Suggesters](/packages/benjaminhaeberli/php-skeleton/suggesters): 0 [Security](/packages/benjaminhaeberli/php-skeleton/advisories): 0 Stars: 0 Watchers: 1 Forks: 0 Open Issues: 0 Requires - php: ^8.3.0 Requires (Dev) [laravel/pint](/packages/laravel/pint): ^1.15.1 [nunomaduro/phpinsights](/packages/nunomaduro/phpinsights): ^2.11 [pestphp/pest](/packages/pestphp/pest): ^2.34.7 [pestphp/pest-plugin-type-coverage](/packages/pestphp/pest-plugin-type-coverage): ^2.8.1 [phpstan/phpstan](/packages/phpstan/phpstan): ^1.10.66 [rector/rector](/packages/rector/rector): ^1.0.4 [spatie/ray](/packages/spatie/ray): ^1.41.1 [symfony/var-dumper](/packages/symfony/var-dumper): ^6.4.0|^7.0.6 README Getting started üîé Requirements - PHP 8.3+ Installation You can create a new repository on GitHub or download the ZIP of the latest release. You can also install it using composer : composer create-project benjaminhaeberli/php-skeleton --prefer-source YourApp Then, install composer packages : composer install Commands ‚å®Ô∏è More details in [composer.json] Common üßπ Keep a modern codebase with Pint ( see default config) composer pint ‚öóÔ∏è Run static analysis using PHPStan composer phpstan ‚úÖ Run unit tests using PEST composer pest üöÄ Run the entire test suite composer test üß∞ Validate composer.json and update dependencies composer core:update üìà Expose code coverage using https://pestphp.com/docs/test-coverage (require XDEBUG in coverage mode) composer pest:coverage Code quality & refactoring üíé Measure the code quality with PHPInsights (see config\insights.php) composer phpinsights ‚úÖ Run refactors using Rector composer rector PHP skeleton is maintained by Benjamin Haeberli under the MIT license.
